params.delta: The caller's balance delta after adding liquidity; the sum of principal delta, fees accrued, and hook delta
params.feesAccrued: The fees accrued since the last time fees were collected from this position
params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the liquidity provider to be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the add liquidity call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook
returns._1: BalanceDelta The hook's delta in token0 and token1. Positive: the hook is owed/took currency, negative: the hook owes/sent currency

params.amount0: The amount of token0 being donated
params.amount1: The amount of token1 being donated
params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the donor to be be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the donate call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.key: The key for the pool being initialized
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the initialize call
params.sqrtPriceX96: The sqrt(price) of the pool as a Q64.96
params.tick: The current tick after the state of a pool is initialized

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.delta: The caller's balance delta after removing liquidity; the sum of principal delta, fees accrued, and hook delta
params.feesAccrued: The fees accrued since the last time fees were collected from this position
params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the liquidity provider to be be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the remove liquidity call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook
returns._1: BalanceDelta The hook's delta in token0 and token1. Positive: the hook is owed/took currency, negative: the hook owes/sent currency

params.delta: The amount owed to the caller (positive) or owed to the pool (negative)
params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the swapper to be be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the swap call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook
returns._1: int128 The hook's delta in unspecified currency. Positive: the hook is owed/took currency, negative: the hook owes/sent currency

params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the liquidity provider to be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the add liquidity call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.amount0: The amount of token0 being donated
params.amount1: The amount of token1 being donated
params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the donor to be be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the donate call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.key: The key for the pool being initialized
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the initialize call
params.sqrtPriceX96: The sqrt(price) of the pool as a Q64.96

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the liquidity provider to be be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the remove liquidity call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook

params.hookData: Arbitrary data handed into the PoolManager by the swapper to be be passed on to the hook
params.sender: The initial msg.sender for the swap call

returns._0: bytes4 The function selector for the hook
returns._1: BeforeSwapDelta The hook's delta in specified and unspecified currencies. Positive: the hook is owed/took currency, negative: the hook owes/sent currency
returns._2: uint24 Optionally override the lp fee, only used if three conditions are met: 1. the Pool has a dynamic fee, 2. the value's 2nd highest bit is set (23rd bit, 0x400000), and 3. the value is less than or equal to the maximum fee (1 million)

returns._0: Whether the order should be routed to vault

params.newThreshold: The new threshold in basis points

afterAddLiquidity(address,(address,addre.notice: The hook called after liquidity is added

afterInitialize(address,(address,address.notice: The hook called after the state of a pool is initialized

afterRemoveLiquidity(address,(address,ad.notice: The hook called after liquidity is removed

afterSwap(address,(address,address,uint2.notice: The hook called after a swap

beforeAddLiquidity(address,(address,addr.notice: The hook called before liquidity is added

beforeInitialize(address,(address,addres.notice: The hook called before the state of a pool is initialized

beforeRemoveLiquidity(address,(address,a.notice: The hook called before liquidity is removed

beforeSwap(address,(address,address,uint.notice: The hook called before a swap

getPoolId((address,address,uint24,int24,.notice: Get pool ID for a pool key (public wrapper)

getVaultThreshold((address,address,uint2.notice: Get vault threshold for a pool

isLargeOrder(int256,(address,address,uin.notice: Check if an order qualifies as a large order for vault routing

orderVault().notice: The order vault contract for encrypted order storage

poolThresholds(bytes32).notice: Mapping of pool keys to custom thresholds

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfer ownership to a new address

vaultThresholdBps().notice: Default vault threshold in basis points (1% = 100 bps)
